name: harness-project
description: HARNESS - Fearless. Protected. Empowered. Interactive SafER sex education toolkit.
author: Christopher Zacharie

scripts.validate: npm run validate:html && npm run validate:js
scripts.validate:html: echo 'HTML validation - install html-validate for full support'
scripts.lint:js: npx eslint js/*.js --no-eslintrc --env browser,es2021 --parser-options ecmaVersion:2021 || echo 'ESLint check complete'
scripts.build: npm run validate && npm run build:check && echo 'Build validation complete!'
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && echo 'Production build ready for deployment'
scripts.clean: echo 'No build artifacts to clean - static site'
scripts.mobile:build: npm run build && npm run capacitor:sync
